name: World's Best Oreo® Fudge
author: Lori
summary: This Oreo® Fudge is very sweet with loads of cookies. A pretty addition to any holiday dessert platter.
ingredients: ½ cup crumbled chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®)
1 cup crushed chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®)
directions: Line a 13x9-inch baking pan with parchment paper
Bring sugar, butter, and evaporated milk to a boil in a heavy-bottomed saucepan, stirring constantly; cook and stir at a boil until mixture is smooth, 3 to 5 minutes
Remove saucepan from heat; stir white chocolate chips and marshmallow creme into the sugar mixture until completely melted
Gently fold 1/2 cup crumbled cookies into the white chocolate mixture until just incorporated; spread into the prepared pan
Sprinkle 1 cup crushed cookies evenly over the top
Press cookies lightly into the fudge
Cool at room temperature until set
Cut into small squares to serve
